attributes.action: Scrap Road Pricing altogether!! & think again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Determine how many newly built & imported Vehicles take to our roads in the UK each year,then bring a law to automatically scrap that amount of vehicles of of 18 yrs old to keep a steady flow of Traffic on the road, THUS alleviating Road Pricing. Its just another Stealth Tax on Drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
